input.sentences: i went on vacation last week .
there were a ton of old ruins that i saw .
some of them were over 1000 years old .
the weather was very good while i was on vacation .
i took a ton of pictures while i was there .
output.sentences: This old piece of concrete stands alone in the meadow.
No one is sure why it is there.
It is a mystery and a lot of people come visit.
There are few ways to determine where it came from.
Whoever built it did a good job.
